casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Sutton, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Sutton, 104 Ohio St.3d 264, 2004-Ohio-6558.]

(No. 2004-0973 -Submitted November 30, 2004 Decided December 15, 2004.) Julia R. Bates, Lucas County Prosecuting Attorney, and Eric A. Baum, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Jack P. Viren Jr., for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Gapen, 104 Ohio St.3d 358, 2004-Ohio-6548, 819 N.E.2d 1047.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur.
